content.question: Based on the passage, Olmsted most likely would have agreed with which of the following claims regarding slavery in Mississippi and Alabama?

choices.label: It was a benign institution and enslaved people were treated humanely.
It had become foundational to the economy of the region and had to be maintained as a “necessary evil.”
It was inefficient compared to the agricultural labor systems in use elsewhere in the United States.
It had fostered interdependence among the economies of the Southern and Northern states.

content.answer: It was inefficient compared to the agricultural labor systems in use elsewhere in the United States.

skill.text: 3.B: Support a claim or argument using specific and relevant evidence.
